fullText:
https://www.wsj.com/articles/uncle-vanya-review-steve-carell-lincoln-center-broadway-alfred-molina-william-jackson-harper-anika-noni-rose-alison-pill-c12f1621

Steve Carell and Alison Pill Photo: Marc J. FranklinNew York

The Vivian Beaumont stage isn’t exactly the proverbial postage stamp. For good reason it has regularly played host in recent years to lavishly—and beautifully—presented classics from the musical-theater canon. Unhappily the new Lincoln Center Theater production of Chekhov’s “Uncle Vanya” makes this amply sized space seem like a football field. Possibly two.
